mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t1.color16 colorHex FROM t_basicsdatum_material_color t LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_colour_library t1 ON (t.company_code = t1.company_code AND t.color_code = t1.colour_code and t1.del_flag = '0') ${ ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT t.color_code , t.color_name as color FROM t_basicsdatum_material_color t WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}
SELECT t.width_code as code, t.name FROM t_basicsdatum_material_width t WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}

SELECT t.id, t1.material_code, t1.material_name, t1.status, t1.material_code_name, t1.category1_name, t1.category2_name, t1.category3_name, t1.category_name, t1.image_url, t1.year_name, t1.season_name, t1.ingredient FROM t_basicsdatum_material_old t LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_material t1 on t.old_material_code = t1.material_code WHERE t.company_code = #{companyCode} and t.del_flag = '0' and t.material_code = #{materialCode}

SELECT m.id, m.image_url, m.material_code, m.material_name, m.supplier_id, m.supplier_name, m.material_category_name, m.loss_rate, m.supplier_quotation_price, w.`name` AS width, w.width_code, m.purchase_unit_code, m.purchase_unit_name, m.stock_unit_code, m.stock_unit_name, m.ingredient, m.category_name, c.color_name AS color, c.color_code, c.supplier_color_code FROM t_basicsdatum_material AS m LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_material_width AS w ON m.material_code = w.material_code and w.del_flag = '0' LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_material_color as c on m.material_code = c.material_code and c.del_flag = '0' ${ ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT tbm.*, tbmc.color_code, tbmc.color_name, tbmp.quotation_price, tbmp.supplier_material_code, tbmc.supplier_color_code FROM t_basicsdatum_material tbm LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_material_color tbmc on tbmc.material_code = tbm.material_code and tbmc.del_flag='0' LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_material_price tbmp on tbmp.material_code = tbm.material_code and select_flag ='1' and tbmp.del_flag='0' ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT LPAD(t.suffix + 1, 5, '0') FROM (SELECT REPLACE(material_code, #{category3Code}, '') AS suffix FROM t_basicsdatum_material WHERE material_code LIKE concat(#{category3Code},'%') AND material_code NOT LIKE '%-%' AND length(REPLACE(material_code, #{category3Code}, '')) = 5) t LEFT JOIN (SELECT REPLACE(material_code, #{category3Code}, '') AS suffix FROM t_basicsdatum_material WHERE material_code LIKE concat(#{category3Code},'%') AND material_code NOT LIKE '%-%' AND length(REPLACE(material_code, #{category3Code}, '')) = 5) t1 ON t.suffix + 1 = t1.suffix WHERE t1.suffix is null and t.suffix >= 0 ORDER BY t.suffix limit 1

SELECT tbm.*, tbmp.quotation_price, tbmp.supplier_material_code FROM t_basicsdatum_material tbm LEFT JOIN t_basicsdatum_material_price tbmp on tbmp.material_code = tbm.material_code and select_flag ='1' and tbmp.del_flag='0' ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select tbm.material_code, tbm.material_name as material_name, tbm.material_code_name as material_code_name, tbm.brand as brand, tbm.brand_name as brand_name, tbm.image_url as image_url, tbm.material_category as material_category, tbm.material_category_name as material_category_name, tbm.ingredient as ingredient, tbmpc.supplier_name as supplier_name, tbmpc.supplier_id as supplier_id, tbmpc.supplier_material_code as supplier_fabric_code, tbmpc.quotation_price as supplier_quotation_price, tbmpc.production_day as production_day, tbmpc.color_name as supplier_color_no, tbm.supplier_color_say as supplier_color_say, tbm.supplier_ingredient as supplier_ingredient, tbm.supplier_factory_ingredient as supplier_factory_ingredient, tbm.ingredient_say as ingredient_say, tbmpc.minimum_order_quantity as minimum_order_quantity, tbm.density as density, tbm.gram_weight as gram_weight, tbm.material_type as material_type, tbm.specification as specification, tbs.supplier_abbreviation from t_basicsdatum_material tbm left join t_basicsdatum_material_price tbmpc on tbm.material_code = tbmpc.material_code and tbmpc.del_flag = '0' and tbmpc.select_flag = 1 and tbmpc.status = '0' left join t_basicsdatum_supplier tbs on tbmpc.supplier_id = tbs.supplier_code and tbs.del_flag = '0' where tbm.del_flag = '0'
${ ew.customSqlSegment.startsWith("WHERE")?ew.customSqlSegment.replace("WHERE","AND "):ew.customSqlSegment}
